page.title: 18Kensworth Playgroup
page.content: Kensworth Playgroup opens Mon,Wed, & Fri from 9-12am. There are 24 children aged 3-5years. They have a home corner which consists of table,chairs, cooker,ironing board,cot,pots & pans, this a favourite with the boys. There are tables with stickle bricks,play- dough,puzzles,dolls house,cars & garage.Also a farmyard with animals. One of their favourites is the sandpit At 11am everything is cleared away for milk & biscuits. This is also when we tell stories,sing songs, sometimes dancing to records. They also look forward to their yearly trip to the zoo.We take them to a restaurant for Christmas lunch with Father Christmas who gives them presents. We are a very happy Playgroup and hope to continue to be so. This Playgroup is run by volunteers mostly mothers.
